ROOT.GetDeviceIdByD5000Id: select b.id from ys_db.ysh_gud_device a join ys_db.ysh_sc_device b on a.sanwei_id=b.col12 WHERE a.jxt_id={id}
ROOT.GetStationIdByScStation: SELECT ID,NAME FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_sc_station where name LIKE '%{0}%'
ROOT.GetDeviceTypeById: select col4 as devicetype,col3 as devicename from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_sc_device where id='{0}'
ROOT.GetStationD5000Id: SELECT D5000_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SUBSTATION_C WHERE DCLOUD_ID={id} UNION ALL select D5000_ID from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_C WHERE DCLOUD_ID={id} UNION ALL select D5000_ID from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_C WHERE DCLOUD_ID={id}

GetIdByName.s: SELECT ID,name,type FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_SUBSTATION_B WHERE NAME LIKE '%{name}%'
GetIdByName.p: SELECT ID,name,plant_type FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_PLANT_B WHERE NAME LIKE '%{name}%'
GetIdByName.c: SELECT ID,name,3002 FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B WHERE NAME LIKE '%{name}%'

GetIdByName.ac: SELECT ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DEV_ACLINE_B WHERE NAME LIKE '%{name}%'
GetIdByName.dc: SELECT ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DEV_DCLINE_B WHERE NAME LIKE '%{name}%'

ROOT.GetACTowerByLineIDAndNO: SELECT ID,LONGITUDE,LATITUDE,{lineID} FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DEV_TOWER_B WHERE ID = (SELECT TOWER_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DEV_ACLINE_R_TOWER WHERE LINE_ID = {lineID} AND TOWERNO = {towerNo} LIMIT 1)
ROOT.GetDCTowerByLineIDAndNO: SELECT ID,LONGITUDE,LATITUDE,{lineID} FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DEV_TOWER_B WHERE ID = (SELECT TOWER_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DEV_DCLINE_R_TOWER WHERE LINE_ID = {lineID} AND TOWERNO = {towerNo} LIMIT 1)
